issue.title: [CF 1521] Errors while switching profiles through /tmw profile "Profile Name"

I got this error when trying to switch profiles by  /tmw profile "Profile Name". After ignoring that error, that seems that new profile is working. But after new login in game all errors repeat.

NO ANY ERRORS, when switching profiles from addon`s options windows. Take a look, please...Or give a suggestion...:)


> Posted by CurseForge user BloodyFess | Imported from CurseForge issue #1521 | Raw
